name: Political Tribune (Formerly DC Tribune)
title: People Questioned Trumps Health After Gop Congresswoman Tweeted A Photo That Appeared To A Bizarre Mark On His Cheek
content: Home Top Storiesnew About Trump Will Be Livid After Lindsey Graham Took A Brutal...byAndrea Thompson Lauren Boebert Was Buried In Humiliation After She Swore She...byAndrea Thompson Analysis,Donald Trump,Entertainment,Social Media **People Questioned Trump’s Health After GOP Congresswoman Tweeted A Photo That Appeared To A Bizarre Mark On His Cheek** **What is that?** Over the years, the American people have had many a reason to wonder about the state of Donald Trump’s mental and physical health. I mean, the fact of the matter is, the man served as the “leader” of this country for four long, hard years. Us constituents have every right to try to ensure that the person in such a position is mentally and physically fit for such a job — especially when that guy has made repeated gaffes that led us to believe that maybe he really wasn’t so fit, including slurred speech, mumbled, incoherent words, apparent limps while walking, unexplained trips to Walter Reed, and a bout with the potentially deadly coronavirus that he was less than honest about the severity of. Of course, Trump is no longer in office now, but the fact of the matter is, he’s still extremely prevalent in this country, for whatever reason; which means his potential health issues still end up under the spotlight pretty often. Recently, Conservative Congresswoman Elise Stefanik posted a photo to her Twitter account of herself and disgraced ex-President Donald Trump giving the thumbs up to the camera. “One team. SAVE AMERICA!!” Stefanik captioned the image. But several Twitter users struggled to pay attention to the photo or the “message” behind it because they couldn’t get past the strange mark that appeared to be on Donald’s left cheek. Take a look: One team. SAVE AMERICA!! 🇺🇸🇺🇸🇺🇸pic.twitter.com/TC2LjyvkMD — Elise Stefanik (@EliseStefanik)June 9, 2021 We’re assuming that Stefanik isn’t editing her photos to include unflattering bruise-like splotches on her “Dear Leader’s” face so we’re gonna go out on a limb here and say whatever that is on his cheek, it’s genuine. And it’s got people wondering: This photo was tweeted by Stefanik an hour ago. Take a look at his cheek. That’s quite a discoloration. Looks like a burn or a melasma (allergic reaction of some sort).pic.twitter.com/l22xtdsZPf — Duty To Warn 🔉 (@duty2warn)June 10, 2021 What happened to drug addled demento’s cheek? — Anne🌊🌊🌊 #NYSTRONG 😷 (@lglnrse)June 10, 2021 It’s not unusual for elderly folks with dementia to fall down. Just sayin’. — cherdebear (@chenereewa)June 10, 2021 That’s a bruise, he’s falling — LooniePanda ,,,😎 (@binkscat1)June 10, 2021 He appears to have a second smaller lesion further back on the left cheek as well. If he was wearing makeup, and they are showing that badly, any further info regarding what you are seeing? — osteoarch (@osteoarch)June 10, 2021 Prob something he’s had for years, but recently loosing most of his staff, that included his make-up artist. He’s not the shade of orange we’ve come to expect on him. Or…..he lost his “connection” to the high quality stuff b/c he’s on a tight budget now. ( lawyers fees & all) — maya h (@goldpearl9)June 10, 2021 Look, I don’t know what that weird spot is and I’m not even going to give it a guess. All I know is, Donald Trump doesn’t look near as healthy as he’s claiming to be. Featured image via screen capture **Can’t get enough Political Tribune? Follow us onTwitter!** **Looking for more video content?
